CustomField.defaultValue: IF( $RecordType.Name == 'RFP (Exhibition or Event)', 'Please provide an overview of client expectations within the RFP that defines deliverables, and budgets for design time, structures & graphics', 'Please provide an overview of client expectations within the contract that defines budgets for design support, structures & graphics')
CustomField.description: Please provide an overview of client expectations within the RFP that defines deliverables, and budgets for design time, structures & graphics
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Overview of clients expectations within the RFP that define necessary fields.
CustomField.label: Project Brief Question 2
